channel.title: Help with adding shops please?
channel.description:
Ok well I've been playing private servers for awhile but started to copy and paste yesterday and it actually started to make a little sense :P So im using NarbScape atm and i wanted to just try to test this out by placing a npc in the lair and have it be a store aswell. Im pretty sure the files i wanna open are NPChandler.java and Shops.cfg . I was looking through it and still have no idea how half of these shops got there because i dont know what [code]shop = 11[/code] or how to even get the i.d. So if someone can help me from step 1 to finish on how to add a store. Can you please add me on msn at Refind@programmer.net ? Thanks! :D
btw narb i love ur narbscape :P[br][size=1]Posted on: April 23, 2007, 01:48:53 AM[/size][hr]any1 :/ ?

item.description:
@ikick221 wrote:

look in download section. There is a shop maker. i would give you my version but my coputer crashed, Sigh
